content:
bjorn3 opened issue #3701:

This flag was introduced in https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/pull/3698, but round tripping between the in memory ir and textual ir format currently loses the flag.

fitzgen closed issue #3701:

This flag was introduced in https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/pull/3698, but round tripping between the in memory ir and textual ir format currently loses the flag.
